<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=last discount&utm_medium=email link&utm_campaign=springoneplatform2017]]> Apache Geode at SpringOne Platform New to the SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/geode?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-q317]]> agenda this year is Apache Geode <[[http://geode.apache.org/]]>, which includes a dozen sessions showcasing Geode case studies and tech features. In addition to sessions throughout SpringOne Platform, we’ll be holding a special Monday afternoon pre-conference all about Apache Geode. The Monday sessions are covered as part of your conference registration. Stay tuned for more details when the complete SpringOne Platform schedule goes live later this month! In less than one year, Geode has become a top-level Apache project with four feature releases, over 20,000 code enhancements and more than 100 committers. Join us to participate in the Apache Geode momentum, engaging in lively discussions with SME’s and sharing usage patterns among project users and committers.
Last Chance to Save $200 The ticket price increases October 22, so register now <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-highlights-q317]]>.
